name: Flight (itch) (Sidoskarly)
description:
Hello , I am Siddharth(20BCG10043) , a college student from VIT Bhopal and this is an educational game i created for my college project.

You can know more about this at- https://youtu.be/e0BBfQu_g0I

Also the Source Code is available in my GitHub- https://github.com/Sidoskarly/Game-Project-Flight

If you want to implement it in your game you can do very well . Just give due credits.
